results.name: Partial alternating sums of binomial(3n,n)^2/(2n+1)^2.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..608
program: (MAGMA) [ &+[(-1)^(n-k)*Binomial(3*k, k)^2/(2*k+1)^2: k in [0..n]]: n in [0..16]];  // _Bruno Berselli_, Apr 11 2011
xref: Cf. Alternate partial sums of binomial(3n,n)^2/(2n+1)^k: A188680 (k=0), A188683 (k=1), this sequence (k=2).
results.author: _Emanuele Munarini_, Apr 08 2011
